\newcommand{\ottprog}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{prog}}{::=}{\ottcom{Program}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{sc_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;} \, ... \, \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{sc_{\ottmv{i}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Sequence of supercombinators $(i > 0)$}}}

\newcommand{\ottsc}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{sc}}{::=}{\ottcom{supercombinators}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{var} \, \, \, \ottnt{var_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{var_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{expr}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Combinator ($i > 0$)}}}

\newcommand{\ottexpr}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{expr}}{::=}{\ottcom{Expressions}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{expr} \, \ottnt{aexpr}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Application}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{expr_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{binop} \, \ottnt{expr_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Infix binary application}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{let} \, \ottnt{defs} \, \mathsf{in} \, \ottnt{expr}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Local definition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{letrec} \, \ottnt{defs} \, \mathsf{in} \, \ottnt{expr}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Local recursive definition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{case} \, \ottnt{expr} \, \mathsf{of} \, \ottnt{alts}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Case expression}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\lambda  \ottnt{var_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{var_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{expr}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Lambda abstraction ($i > 0$)}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{aexpr}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Atomic expression}}}

\newcommand{\ottaexpr}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{aexpr}}{::=}{\ottcom{Atomic expression}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{var}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{num}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Number}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{Pack} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{num_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{num_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Datatype constructor}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{expr}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Parened expression}}}

\newcommand{\ottdefs}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{defs}}{::=}{\ottcom{Definitions}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{def_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;} \, ... \, \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{def_{\ottmv{i}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Sequence of definitions ($i > 0$)}}}

\newcommand{\ottdef}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{def}}{::=}{\ottcom{Definition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{var}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{expr}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{A definition}}}

\newcommand{\ottalts}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{alts}}{::=}{\ottcom{Alternatives}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{alt_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;} \, ... \, \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{alt_{\ottmv{i}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Sequence of alternatives ($i > 0$)}}}

\newcommand{\ottalt}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{alt}}{::=}{\ottcom{Alternative}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{altid} \, \ottnt{var_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{var_{\ottmv{i}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{An alternative ($i \geq 0$)}}}

\newcommand{\ottaltid}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{altid}}{::=}{\ottcom{Alternative id}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \langle  \ottnt{num}  \rangle }{}{}{}{\ottcom{Id}}}

\newcommand{\ottbinop}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{binop}}{::=}{\ottcom{Binary operations}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{arithop}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Arithmetic operator}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{relop}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Comparison operator}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{boolop}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Boolean operator}}}

\newcommand{\ottarithop}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{arithop}}{::=}{\ottcom{Arithmetic operator}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{+}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Addition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{-}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Subtraction}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{*}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Multiplication}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{/}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Division}}}

\newcommand{\ottrelop}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{relop}}{::=}{\ottcom{Comparison operator}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{<}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Less than}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\leq}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Less than or equal to}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{>}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Greater than}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\geq}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Greater than or equal to}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\neq}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Not equal to}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{==}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Equal to}}}

\newcommand{\ottboolop}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{boolop}}{::=}{\ottcom{Boolean operator}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\&}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Conjunction}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{|}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Disjunction}}}

\newcommand{\ottvar}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{var}}{::=}{\ottcom{Variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{lalpha} \, \ottnt{varch_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \ottnt{varch_{\ottmv{i}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{A sequence of chars ($i >= 0$)}}}

\newcommand{\ottvarch}{
